brief_title: Effectiveness of Two Approved Drugs in Lowering High Cholesterol (0733-224)
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of two approved drugs in lowering high cholesterol when taken together, compared to taking only one of the drugs.
detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 12 weeks.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Elevated cholesterol level Exclusion Criteria: - Liver disease - Known allergies to study drugs
